summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Michigan Street, from 1st Avenue South to Corson Avenue, and Maynard Avenue, from Michigan Street to River Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, planking, constructing concrete sidewalks with the necessary cross walks; providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5015, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
